item.title: 第一量子公司退出巴拿马铜矿仲裁案
item.description: 第一量子矿业有限公司（First Quantum Minerals Ltd.）撤销了针对巴拿马的一起仲裁案件，并暂停了另一起仲裁案件，这表明该公司有可能与巴拿马就已停产一年多的铜矿进行更多谈判。【原文：First Quantum Minerals Ltd. dropped one of its arbitration cases against Panama and suspended another, signaling potential for more negotiations with the nation over the company’s copper mine that’s been shuttered for more than a year.】

item.title: 特朗普成立投资办公室监管芯片法案基金
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统签署了一项行政命令，在商务部内设立一个办公室，以促进和加快在美国超过 10 亿美元的投资，并管理《芯片与科学法案》的联邦基金。【原文：President Donald Trump signed an executive order to establish an office within the Commerce Department to facilitate and speed up investments of more than $1 billion in the US and administer federal funds from the Chips and Science Act.】

item.title: 美国汽车制造商游说将低成本零部件排除在关税之外
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国汽车制造商正在游说特朗普政府将某些汽车零部件排除在关税之外，作为在关税本周生效前影响关税的最后努力的一部分。【原文：US automakers are lobbying the Trump administration to exclude certain vehicle parts from tariffs as part of a last-ditch effort to influence the levies before they start taking effect this week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富国银行认为特朗普贸易战打响后美元将反弹
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）的货币策略师称，美元将成为唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易战的市场赢家之一。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co.’s currency strategists say the US dollar stands to be one of the market winners from President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 英特尔首席执行官称优先招聘和留住工程人才
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp.英特尔公司首席执行官陈立武（Lip-Bu Tan）表示，他的首要任务之一是为这家芯片制造商补充一些多年来流失的人才。【原文：Intel Corp. Chief Executive Officer Lip-Bu Tan said one of his priorities will be to restock the chipmaker with some of the talent that it has lost over the years.】

item.title: Newsmax 创始人、前《纽约邮报》记者克里斯托弗-鲁迪如今已是亿万富翁
item.description: Newsmax Inc. 首次以上市公司身份亮相后，其创始人兼首席执行官克里斯托弗-鲁迪（Christopher Ruddy）的身家暴涨 735%，达到约 33 亿美元。【原文：Newsmax Inc.’s debut as a public company has given founder and Chief Executive Officer Christopher Ruddy a fortune of about $3.3 billion after its shares surged 735%.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税政策将创造历史并打破 MAGA 所厌恶的制度
item.description:
他的计划引发了对美国经济衰退和全球经济放缓以及战后秩序终结的担忧。【原文：

His plans have sparked fears of a US recession and a global slowdown, as well as the end of a post-war order.

】

item.title: Oculus 联合创始人的人工智能语音创业公司正与红杉洽谈融资事宜
item.description:
Sesame AI 正在讨论由红杉资本（Sequoia Capital）和星火资本（Spark Capital）共同领投的一轮超过 2 亿美元的融资。【原文：

Sesame AI is discussing a funding round of more than $200 million, co-led by Sequoia Capital and Spark Capital. 

】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织总裁称关税不确定性风险拖累全球增长
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁征收关税的不确定性有可能削弱全球经济活动。【原文：The head of the International Monetary Fund said uncertainty around US President Donald Trump’s threatened tariffs risks denting global economic activity.】

item.title: 乌拉圭新任央行行长誓言坚决遏制通货膨胀
item.description: 乌拉圭中央银行主席吉列尔莫-托洛萨（Guillermo Tolosa）在接受采访时表示，乌拉圭准备在必要时进一步加息，以引导通胀和物价预期达到4.5%的目标，因为这个南美国家正努力在近期成功降低消费者物价的基础上再接再厉。【原文：Uruguay is prepared to further hike interest rates if needed to guide inflation and price expectations to the 4.5% target as the South American country seeks to build on its recent success in cooling consumer prices, Central Bank Chairman Guillermo Tolosa said in an interview.】

item.title: 纳斯达克 100 指数多年来最差一季因人工智能泡沫担忧而终结
item.description: 在关税不确定性、美国政府削减开支和经济衰退威胁等因素影响下，本季度纳斯达克 100 指数受到的最新打击是对人工智能泡沫的担忧。【原文：In a quarter marred by tariff uncertainty, US government spending cuts and the threat of recession, it is fears about a bubble brewing in artificial intelligence that have dealt the latest blow to the Nasdaq 100.】

item.title: 巴西生物燃料发展助推玉米产量创 2022 年以来新高
item.description: 巴西将比以往更多的玉米转化为燃料，推高了谷物价格，使世界第二大谷物供应国的出口变得更加不确定。【原文：Brazil is turning more corn into fuel than ever before, pushing prices of the grain higher and making exports more uncertain for the world’s second-largest supplier.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯认为关税有可能导致通胀上升
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，今年存在通胀走高的风险，不过他的基本观点是通胀将保持相对稳定。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said there’s a risk of higher inflation this year, though his baseline view is that it will remain relatively stable.】

item.title: 安森美邀请摩根士丹利协助追求 Allegro
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，安森美半导体公司（On Semiconductor Corp.【原文：On Semiconductor Corp. has enlisted Morgan Stanley for advice as it pursues Allegro Microsystems Inc., people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Banorte 数字银行推出一年后重组
item.description: 墨西哥金融集团 Banorte 在推出数字银行 Bineo 一年多之后，正在对其进行重组。【原文：Mexico’s Grupo Financiero Banorte is restructuring its digital bank Bineo just over one year after launching the venture which has racked up more than $50 million in losses so far.】

item.title: 米莱伊执政期间物价降温，阿根廷贫困率急剧下降
item.description: 随着哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统的休克式紧缩计划产生的通货紧缩效应深入人心，阿根廷的贫困率急剧下降。【原文：Poverty in Argentina dropped sharply as the disinflationary effects of President Javier Milei’s shock austerity program took root.】

item.title: 坎托分析师抨击小肯尼迪，警告 "危险领域
item.description: Cantor Fitzgerald 的生物技术分析师抨击了卫生与公众服务部部长小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.【原文：Cantor Fitzgerald biotech analysts slammed the leadership of Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr., calling on the Trump administration to “re-evaluate” his role after a top vaccine official stepped down.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚中央银行不惧压力，将利率维持在 9.5% 不变
item.description: 哥伦比亚中央银行不畏政治压力，连续第二次会议维持利率不变，因为政策制定者对通货膨胀加速和大流行病以来最大规模的财政赤字忧心忡忡。【原文：Colombia’s central bank defied political pressure and held interest rates unchanged for a second straight meeting as policymakers fret about accelerating inflation and the widest fiscal deficit since the pandemic.】

item.title: 水上主题公园运营商海豚公司申请破产
item.description: 拉丁美洲最大的水上主题公园运营商海豚公司（The Dolphin Company）已在美国申请破产，以重组其债务并应对其所称的财务挑战。【原文：The largest aquatic theme park operator in Latin America, The Dolphin Company, has filed bankruptcy in the US to restructure its debt and address what it described as financial challenges.】

item.title: 迈克尔-乔丹的球衣和纹身特朗普的 "外星敌人 "指南遭律师质疑
item.description: 据挑战特朗普政府的律师称，身穿迈克尔-乔丹球衣并有纹身的委内瑞拉男子被不公平地打上了 "外敌 "帮派成员的标签，应被驱逐出境。【原文：Venezuelan men wearing Michael Jordan jerseys and sporting tattoos have been unfairly branded as “alien enemy” gang members worthy of deportation, according to lawyers challenging the Trump administration.】

item.title: 惠誉称澳大利亚钢铁生产商 InfraBuild 面临 "迫在眉睫 "的违约风险
item.description: 惠誉评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将 InfraBuild Australia Pty Ltd. 的评级进一步下调至垃圾级，称该澳大利亚钢铁生产商在未来三个月内违约 5.5 亿美元票据的可能性 "升高"。【原文：Fitch Ratings downgraded InfraBuild Australia Pty Ltd. further into junk, saying it sees an “elevated” probability that the Australian steel producer will default on $550 million of notes within the next three months.】

item.title: 莫桑比克开始审查采矿、石油和天然气法
item.description: 莫桑比克矿产资源和能源部周一表示，莫桑比克已启动一项进程，对这个东南非国家的采矿、石油和天然气法律框架进行审查和现代化。【原文：Mozambique has started a process to review and modernize the southeast African nation’s legal framework for mining, oil and gas, the Ministry of Mineral Resources and Energy said Monday.】

item.title: 微软支持的初创公司 Builder.ai 聘请审计师调查虚高销售额
item.description: Builder.ai下调了向投资者提供的销售数据，并聘请审计师检查其过去两年的账目，这对这家由微软公司和卡塔尔投资局支持的人工智能初创公司来说是一个重大挫折。【原文：Builder.ai lowered the sales figures it provided to investors and hired auditors to examine its last two years of accounts, a major setback for the artificial intelligence startup backed by Microsoft Corp. and the Qatar Investment Authority.】

item.title: 巴西 Votorantim 公司誓言对加息和特朗普关税保持谨慎
item.description: 由于借贷成本上升以及美国总统唐纳德-特朗普领导下的全球经济转型，巴西最富有家族之一所拥有的一家巴西企业集团正在收紧其新投资的标准。【原文：A Brazilian conglomerate owned by one of the country’s richest families is tightening its criteria for new investments thanks to rising borrowing costs and the global economic shift taking place under US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: GlobalFoundries 探索与台湾联电合并
item.description: 熟悉情况的人士透露，GlobalFoundries 公司正在探讨与台湾芯片制造商联华电子公司（United Microelectronics Corp.）合并的可能性，这是一项酝酿已久的交易的一部分，旨在打造一家更具弹性的老一代半导体制造商。【原文：GlobalFoundries Inc. is exploring a potential merger with the Taiwanese chipmaker United Microelectronics Corp. as part of a long-shot deal aimed at creating a more resilient manufacturer of older-generation semiconductors, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 小额债券 3 月份跌幅为 2020 年以来最大，落后于国债
item.description: 与美国国债相比，市政债券将迎来自 2020 年 3 月该资产类别因大流行病而暴跌以来最糟糕的一个月。【原文：Municipal bonds are heading for their worst month — compared to US Treasuries — since the asset class’s pandemic-fueled rout in March 2020.】

item.title: SpaceX 将发射由加密货币投资者资助的极地航天飞行器
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司即将发射首个飞越地球极地的载人航天飞行任务，该任务由加密货币投资者王俊（Chun Wang）出资并指挥。【原文：Elon Musk’s SpaceX is set to launch the first human spaceflight mission to fly over the Earth’s polar regions, funded and commanded by cryptocurrency investor Chun Wang.】

item.title: 美国因芬太尼贸易制裁锡那罗亚贩毒集团同伙
item.description: 美国财政部制裁了六个人和七家企业，称他们参与了支持墨西哥锡那罗亚卡特尔的洗钱活动。【原文：The US Treasury Department sanctioned six people and seven businesses it said have been involved in a money laundering operation supporting the Sinaloa Cartel in Mexico.】

item.title: 亚马逊将恢复工人失窃筛查，要求提供电话详细信息
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）将恢复对离开仓库的员工进行金属探测器检查；这是一项在大流行病期间暂停的防盗措施；亚马逊公司还要求员工登记个人手机，以便安保人员知道手机没有被盗。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. will resume metal-detector screening for employees leaving its warehouses — a theft-prevention measure suspended during the pandemic — and is asking workers to register their personal phones so security personnel know they aren’t stolen.】

item.title: 贸易战持续发酵，加航称美国订票量下降 10
item.description: 加拿大航空公司（Air Canada）称，春夏季加拿大与美国城市之间的航班需求疲软，因为加拿大人为应对贸易战而避免南下。【原文：Air Canada says demand for flights between Canadian and US cities is weak for the spring and summer months, as Canadians respond to the trade war by avoiding trips south.】
